descriptionHtml:
Arab themed art for desert-themed mods.

 I made this stuff for the upcoming version 3.0 of my mod Sungarde, that will feature a desert/savanna worldspace with an arab-themed bandit faction.  There are 3 banners, 4 rugs and 4 altar/table cover cloths, and  I decided to release them as a free resource  for anybody who is looking for desert-themed clutter.

 This is a resource and the new meshes are not ingame yet. If you want to check them out: activate ArabartTEST.esp, launch skyrim, use the console and type "coc Aartarab".

You may use, modify and redistribute this as you wish, just give credits for my work.

Version 1.2 update:

  This is the update, requires main file if you want to see all stuff together in the test cell.
  It adds 2 banners, 2 table runners and 3 rugs with muslim art from Persia and Indonesia. The persian designs were obtained from medieval drawings which were not preserved in a "pristine" state, and despite I did my best to get it right, their resolution will not be very good.
author: Leodoidao
